Title: Relates to including a statement on the envelopes of ballots for absentee voters and special presidential voters for signature affirmation
Summary: Includes a statement on the envelopes of ballots for absentee voters and special presidential voters for signature affirmation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to including a statement on the envelopes of ballots for absentee voters and special presidential voters for signature affirmation
